Title: Provides that residential real property which sustained 50% or greater damage in Hurricane Sandy, and is rebuilt shall be assessed at its pre-Sandy market value
Summary: Provides that residential real property which sustained 50% or greater damage in Hurricane Sandy, and is rebuilt shall be assessed at its pre-Sandy market value.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to assessment of residential real property catastrophically impacted by superstorm Sandy
